message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?  I'm confident you'll see a considerable return on this investment.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I still believe $10,000 is the right price for me. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to be closer to my bottom line.  Let's do this, $12,500 and we have a deal.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. While I appreciate your flexibility, I still feel that $10,000 is the fair price for this product. I hope we can find common ground.
